Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.apis

Class APIManager

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.apis.APIManager
public class APIManager
extends java.lang.Object
Tracks which API is currently being used and requests the APIFactory create it if it does not exist.
Author:
dougnoel@gmail.com

  • Method Details

    • setAPI

      public static void setAPI​(java.lang.String apiName)
      Stores an API using the passed API name to instantiate it.
      Parameters:
      apiName - String the name of the sentinel API object to create and store

    • getAPI

      public static API getAPI()
      Returns the currently active API
      Returns:
      API Currently selected API by the tester.

    • setBody

      public static void setBody​(java.lang.String body)
      Sets the body of a new request for the current API
      Parameters:
      body - String the body in the form of json

    • addParameter

      public static void addParameter​(java.lang.String parameter, java.lang.String value)
      Set a parameter and its value for a request. They will show up as part of the query string in the API request.
      Parameters:
      parameter - String the parameter being passed
      value - String the value to be passed

    • sendRequest

      public static void sendRequest​(RequestType type, java.lang.String endpoint)
      Send a request of the given type. The response will be stored in a Response object that the APIManager can retrieve.
      Parameters:
      type - com.dougnoel.sentinel.enums.RequestType the type of request to send
      endpoint - the endpoint to send the request

    • getResponse

      public static Response getResponse()
      Returns the most recent response.
      Returns:
      Response the response

    • setResponse

      public static void setResponse​(Response response)
      Sets the most recent response.
      Parameters:
      response - Response the response
